bibl.title: A New Papyrology?
bibl.note: Methodological observations on the papers presented by C.W. Hobson, J.G. Keenan and R.S. Bagnall in Boston, December 29, 1989, in a "Seminar on Comparative Approaches to the Social History of Roman Egypt", during the Annual Meeting of the American Philological Association.
Frier Bruce W., A New Papyrology?
